response.original_title: 名探偵コナン ゼロの執行人
response.overview: After a sudden explosion at Edge of Ocean island in Tokyo, Tōru Amuro, codename Zero, begins to investigate. Meanwhile, private eye Kogorō is arrested as a suspect, so Conan Edogawa conducts his own investigation to prove his innocence, but Amuro stands in his way.
response.title: Case Closed: Zero the Enforcer
